forecast-period.text: Mostly sunny morning. Slight (20%) chance of a shower late afternoon or evening. Winds southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending southerly 20 to 30 km/h in the morning.
Large and powerful surf conditions in the evening are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as rock fishing, swimming and surfing.
Low-Moderate
UV Alert from 9:50 am to 4:20 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 8 [Very High]
Partly cloudy. High (70%) chance of showers, most likely in the morning and afternoon. Winds southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h turning southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the late afternoon.
Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely in the afternoon and evening. Winds southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h tending southerly during the morning then becoming light during the evening.
Partly cloudy. Medium (50%) chance of showers, most likely in the morning and afternoon. Winds southeast to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h becoming light during the evening.
Mostly sunny. Light winds.
Sunny. Light winds becoming northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the day.
Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers. Light winds becoming southerly 25 to 35 km/h later.

Sunny morning. Some cloud developing in the afternoon, with the slight (20%) chance of a late shower along the coastal fringe. South to southwesterly winds 15 to 20 km/h tending tending south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the afternoon and reaching 30 km/h near the coast.
Large and powerful surf conditions in the afternoon and evening are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as rock fishing, swimming and surfing.
Low-Moderate
UV Alert from 9:50 am to 4:20 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 8 [Very High]
Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely in the morning and afternoon. Winds south to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending south to southeasterly in the morning.
Cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers. Light winds becoming south to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the morning then tending south to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the day.

Partly cloudy. Medium (50%) chance of showers, most likely in the morning and afternoon. Winds south to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending south to southeasterly during the day then becoming light during the evening.
Mostly sunny. Light winds.
Sunny. Light winds becoming northeasterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers. Light winds becoming northwest to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
Sunny morning. Slight (20%) chance of a shower this evening. Winds southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h turning south to southeasterly 20 to 30 km/h during the afternoon and evening.
Large and powerful surf conditions in the evening are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as rock fishing, swimming and surfing.
Low-Moderate
UV Alert from 9:50 am to 4:20 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 9 [Very High]
Partly cloudy. High (70%) chance of showers. Winds southerly 15 to 25 km/h tending southeasterly in the early afternoon.
Cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers. Winds southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h tending southerly during the morning.

Partly cloudy. Medium (50%) chance of showers, most likely in the morning and afternoon. Winds south to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h tending south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h during the afternoon then becoming light during the evening.
Mostly sunny. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Light winds.
Mostly sunny. Light winds becoming north to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning.
Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers. Winds northerly 15 to 20 km/h.
Sunny morning. Slight (20%) chance of a shower this evening. Winds southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending southerly 20 to 30 km/h in the middle of the day.
Large and powerful surf conditions in the evening are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as rock fishing, swimming and surfing.
High

Partly cloudy. High (70%) chance of showers. Winds southerly 15 to 20 km/h becoming light before dawn then becoming southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the early afternoon.
Cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely in the morning and afternoon. Light winds becoming southerly 15 to 20 km/h during the morning then becoming light during the evening.

Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower. Light winds.

Mostly sunny morning. Medium (60%) chance of showers later in the day. Light winds becoming north to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the morning.
Sunny day, with some cloud developing in the evening. Light winds becoming easterly 15 to 20 km/h in the late evening.
